name: Martini
description: A classic gin-based cocktail, characterized by dry vermouth and an olive.
tasting_notes: Dry, sharp, with sophisticated herbal notes.

name: Margarita

origin.author: Multiple theories, including one attributing it to Margarita Sames

description: A well-balanced cocktail with tequila, lime juice, and triple sec, offering a mix of sour and sweet.
tasting_notes: Refreshing citrus flavor with a salt accent.

name: Mojito
description: A refreshing cocktail made with rum, lime, and mint, perfect for hot weather.
tasting_notes: Invigorating with the aroma of rum, the coolness of mint, and the sourness of lime.

name: Old Fashioned
description: The original classic cocktail based on bourbon, featuring a harmony of sweetness and bitterness.
tasting_notes: A woody richness woven from sweetness and bitterness.

name: Negroni
description: A traditional Italian bitter cocktail made with equal parts gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth.
tasting_notes: A complex interplay of bitterness, herbs, and orange flavor.

name: Daiquiri

origin.author: Named after the town of Daiquirí

description: A simple, sour cocktail made from white rum, lime juice, and sugar.
tasting_notes: A good balance of refreshing sourness and sweetness.

name: Manhattan
description: A classic cocktail of rye whiskey and sweet vermouth.
tasting_notes: Characterized by spicy notes with a solid sweetness and bitterness.

name: Cosmopolitan
description: A fruity and sour vodka-based cocktail.
tasting_notes: Characterized by citrus aroma and the sweet and sour taste of cranberry.

name: Gimlet
description: A simple and sour cocktail made with gin and lime.

alternatives.name: Freshly Squeezed Lime Juice & Simple Syrup

tasting_notes: Sharp lime sourness and the herbal flavor of gin.

name: Bloody Mary
description: A spicy and savory cocktail based on vodka and tomato juice.
tasting_notes: A spicy and rich tomato flavor.

name: Whiskey Sour
description: A balanced sour cocktail with whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar.
tasting_notes: Balanced tartness and sweetness.

name: Sidecar
description: A classic cocktail with cognac, lemon juice, and triple sec.
tasting_notes: Tart with refined cognac aroma.

name: Pina Colada
description: A sweet tropical cocktail with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice.
tasting_notes: Rich coconut and sweet pineapple harmony.

name: Tom Collins
description: A refreshing gin and lemon juice with soda water long drink.
tasting_notes: Refreshing and aromatic.

name: Caipirinha
description: Brazil's national cocktail made with cachaça, lime, and sugar.
tasting_notes: Lime acidity and sugar sweetness stand out.

name: Mai Tai
description: A tropical rum-based cocktail with orange curaçao and lime.
tasting_notes: Fruity and nutty with lime's acidity.

name: Paloma
description: A refreshing long drink with tequila and grapefruit soda.
tasting_notes: Citrus and salt balanced for refreshment.

name: French 75
description: An elegant sparkling cocktail with gin and champagne.
tasting_notes: Bright and floral, with citrus aroma.

name: Aviation
description: A floral, slightly sour classic cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, maraschino liqueur, and crème de violette.
tasting_notes: Floral aroma with citrus and gentle bitterness.

name: Espresso Martini
description: A modern coffee cocktail with espresso, vodka, and coffee liqueur, balancing bitterness and sweetness.
tasting_notes: Balanced bitterness and sweetness, smooth and creamy.
